name: shared-moments
description: SharedMoments is a self-hosted web app for couples to privately collect and relive photos, videos, and milestones. It supports galleries, timelines, countdowns, and shared lists in a romantic, tailored interface.
features: Photo galleries: Upload and organize photos in private albums for couples.
Video storage: Store and play video memories with secure, private access.
Timeline view: Display memories chronologically to relive your journey together.
Milestone tracking: Record important dates, anniversaries, and relationship milestones.
Countdown timers: Create countdowns for upcoming events, trips, or special occasions.
Shared lists: Collaborate on to-do lists, wish lists, or planning checklists.
Private messaging: Send notes and messages to your partner within the app.
Memory captions: Add descriptions, dates, and locations to photos and videos.
Mobile responsive: Access and upload memories from smartphones and tablets.
Secure access: Password-protected with encryption for complete privacy.
Export options: Download your memories for backup or printing.
Romantic themes: Customizable interface with couple-focused design elements.
